summary: An ordinance providing for the issuance of refunding bonds of the City of Seattle for the purpose of refunding and paying bonds of said city which will mature, July 1, 1917, known as "Seattle Sewer Refunding Bonds of 1913" in the sum of Seventy Thousand ($70,000) Dollars, and providing for the issuance and sale thereof, and the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
